# `useChangePassword()`

## Overload 1 of 2

Use the hook `useChangePassword` to change password for the user.

```tsx
const { changePassword, isLoading, isSuccess, isError, error } =
  useChangePassword()

console.log({ isLoading, isSuccess, isError, error })

const handleFormSubmit = async (e) => {
  e.preventDefault()

  await changePassword('my-new-password')
}
```

### Parameters

---

<span className="light-grey">This overload doesn't accept any arguments.</span>

---

## Overload 2 of 2

Use the hook `useChangePassword` to change password for the user.

```tsx
const { changePassword, isLoading, isSuccess, isError, error } =
  useChangePassword()

console.log({ isLoading, isSuccess, isError, error })

const handleFormSubmit = async (e) => {
  e.preventDefault()

  await changePassword('my-new-password')
}
```

### Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">email</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> <code>string</code>
